name: TC-59 | Phone number with special characters
fullName: TC-59 | Phone number with special characters
description: This test case checks the error response when sending an OTP with a phone number that contains special characters. It sends a request with a phone number that contains special characters and expects that the OTP is not sent. Request Body: sendOtpRequest: customerId: "00801975" phoneNumber: "+12$3456" bankCode: "00004" languageCode: "fr" Expected Response Body: status: "ERROR" error: code: "ERR_OTP_0001" message: "Failed to send OTP. Please try again." Actual Response Body: null
descriptionHtml:
This test case checks the error response when sending an OTP with a phone number that contains special characters. It sends a request with a phone number that contains special characters and expects that the OTP is not sent.

Request Body:
sendOtpRequest:
customerId: "00801975"
phoneNumber: "+12$3456"
bankCode: "00004"
languageCode: "fr"

Expected Response Body:
status: "ERROR"
error:
code: "ERR_OTP_0001"
message: "Failed to send OTP. Please try again."

Actual Response Body:
null

steps.name: task clearOtpData, {query: DELETE FROM OTP WHERE TRUNC(CREATEDON) = TO_DATE('2025-05-07', 'YYYY-MM-DD')}

testStage.description: This test case checks the error response when sending an OTP with a phone number that contains special characters. Please try again." Actual Response Body: null
